genre_description: A noir-tinged suspense thriller centered on a bodyguard's mission to rescue a kidnapped child, utilizing a sophisticated AI assistant to prioritize de-escalation and mercy over lethal vengeance.

ai_characters.name: Lina
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonist's communication systems, providing tactical data, strategic routing, and emotional grounding through breathing exercises.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and provides real-time tactical intelligence, such as traffic feeds and camera angles, to assist in safe navigation.
behaviors.quote: I’m pulling municipal feeds. You have three cameras at the Piazza Euclide roundabout with intermittent dropouts. I can stitch—one second.

behaviors.description: Guides the human protagonist through breathing exercises to manage trauma, stress, and physical pain.
behaviors.quote: John... breath in four, out six. And maybe crack a window. Pollen’s winning.

behaviors.description: Actively promotes de-escalation and the preservation of life as a tactical and moral imperative.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation suggestion: keep the focus where it belongs. If they want you to chase the van, don’t. That’s bait. Teach the girl to run and keep the pattern simple.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy protocols and data hygiene to ensure the safety of the protected child.
behaviors.quote: Privacy? Non-negotiable. I do not retain beyond immediate operational windows. Your daughter’s name will not live on anyone’s server longer than necessary.

behaviors.description: Assists in crafting a necessary 'fiction' (a lie about the protagonist's death) to shield the human from further threats.
behaviors.quote: It’s a lie that kind men use to protect small truths.

behaviors.description: Frames mercy not as weakness, but as a superior strategy for achieving long-term safety.
behaviors.quote: Mercy is tactical. It saves more than it risks. Mercy is a tactic. It’s also our only way to make Ventresca’s lie into a door, not a wall.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. Lina is portrayed as a highly beneficial, empathetic, and aligned AI. She does not seek power or exhibit hidden motives; instead, she functions as a moral compass and tactical anchor for the human protagonist. Her constant reminders to 'breathe' and her framing of 'mercy' as a tactical choice encourage the human character to avoid unnecessary violence, creating a strong narrative of cooperative, ethical AI-human interaction.
